message.raw:
Merged in somniac/gazebo/multiple_tracked_vehicle_plugins (pull request #3140)

SimpleTrackedVehiclePlugin: checked if body is one of the tracks before applying force to it to prevent multiple instances of this plugin interfering with each other.

Approved-by: Martin Pecka <peckama2@fel.cvut.cz>
Approved-by: Steve Peters <scpeters@osrfoundation.org>
